body_html:
I've managed to compile pytorch on ubuntu 17.10 and cuda 9.0 using Docker (that had image of ubuntu 16.04) and adopted version of this script: https://github.com/pytorch/builder/blob/master/manywheel/build.sh.
to build a proper wheel archive.

If anyone needs a hand let me know I can post the steps.

to build a proper wheel archive.
If anyone needs  a hand let me know I can post the steps.
body:
I've managed to compile pytorch on ubuntu 17.10 and cuda 9.0 using Docker (that had image of ubuntu 16.04) and adopted version of this script: https://github.com/pytorch/builder/blob/master/manywheel/build.sh.
to build a proper wheel archive.

If anyone needs  a hand let me know I can post the steps.
